replies.body: I was really hoping that when this came along, Exiled Morg would get the gold/red particles it deserves as a 975 skin.
Im still praying one day Magnificent Twisted Fate will get the particles he deserves
And Shadow Prince Malz.

I would upvote this sooo many times...gold particles...please Rito.

{{champion:90}}
Upvotes for both Shadow Prince Malzahar and Magnificent Twisted Fate.
Please don't forget about Lord Mordekaiser. It's very old and has no particles or animations.
most needed visual update for skin cost ever.
Gentelman cho gath please. I really love his unique quotes but he really deserves unique animations also as a legendary skin. Rito pls, i dont wanna wait till its rework {{item:3070}} {{champion:31}}
I think its really dumb that Exiled Morg is only one that didnt get its own effects.
Sinful Succulence Morgana, Blade Mistress Morgana, Exiled Morgana and original all have the same effects.

Taken from a post I did below - 

"In updates we try our best to parallel what is on live currently. Exiled Morgana only had unique auto attack and idle effects. I don't disagree that there are varying levels of deliverables for older skins prices, but in this case we wanted to take what she has on live and make a nicer version. "
I'm in a software Junior Project right now and I'd just like to say this. The bare minimum can be an awful lot to go after. It may not seem like it but that's just the truth of the matter.
Then they shouldn't use a price scale based on the amount of work required for a skin, then ignore it because "it's hard" or it's "a lot to do."
Agreed.  To avoid current existing skins from becoming Chroma skins, they'll need new particles.

A long time ago, in a season far, far away, Exiled Morgana skin was released at a ridiculously high rp price for TWO DAYS (was over 1100 rp or something) and then changed to 975 rp promptly after those days. I assumed it was a legendary skin since back then there weren't many of them and the pricing was higher than 975 and the idea sounded like a legendary. Alas, it was not. You may say 'But why didn't you get a refund then?' well refunds didn't exist back then young one so that rp is lost to the winds of time as is the beautiful particles which it could have been. ps. why can't you borrow the red particles from the thorn skin and just remove the effects of leaves/thorns - seems easy enough.

Agreed...this update is a little on the lazy side. But thanks Riot for finally representing the actual hitbox for Q. Getting caught by the "peripherals" was starting to become equally cheap and annoying.
Wildly agree. It's my favorite skin, but the particles are extremely lack luster.

That's the entire reason I bought her. I'm trying to deal with the disappointment. Maybe it'll show up in her complete VU (model update? etc?) if they do one...but now with a TU and effects update, I don't think it'll happen.
I always thought it would be cool if they made pairs of reverse skins, like Redeemed Morgana{{champion:25}} and Fallen Angel Kayle {{champion:10}}
Yah and Lunar Leona{{champion:89}} and Solar Diana{{champion:131}}!
This would be really sweet, thanks for the idea!

"Now Morg players can judge more accurately whether their Q’s going to land"

You already can. If you throw it in the general direction of anyone, + or - 45 degrees, it'll hit.
{{champion:44}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} still waiting for taric {{item:2044}}
Taric's update (gameplay & visual) is being worked.Probably won't be out for a while (maybe a year or more,who knows).Just wanted to say he is being worked on.
Yay really? IS THIS REAL? Awesome. I love him. He is just so ugly~
Now if you could just update her dress, so it looks like a dress, instead of a centaur crossed with a garden slug.
I don't understand why they can't make Exiled Morgana's abilities red and yellowish... that would look so sweet i've been wanting that for over a year. GG rito{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

This isn't a visual update.  This is a texture re balance.  Honestly it seems like Riot put a ton of work into this, but I feel like they're gonna have to look at her again in a year.  It didn't get rid of the problem that she doesn't have legs, her posture, or her outrageous ears.  Her anatomy is still a disaster and her wings still don't have discernible feathers.  And don't get me started on Exile Morgana.  This is upsetting to see tbh and I would rather wait for riot to finish completely overhauling Morgana, as opposed to a texture re balance passed off as a visual update.
Who else is waiting for {{champion:78}} to get an update?
I'm waiting for his overhaul {{champion:44}}
Millions of players.
Awesome, though Ghost Bride is what I use and it looks pretty much the same as before.
Looks like Blackthorn Morgana's Q has a wider circle around the enemy's feet when they are snared compared to the other skins. Probably not a big deal, but I thought I'd point that out.
Thanks for letting us know! I'll take a look. :)
It's because the camera angle is zoomed in slightly more than the others.
It is because the camera angle is zoomed in slightly more than the others.
She really needs new vocals ):
pls pls pls put the chain sounds back on ghost bride morgana's ult

i dont understand what their thing is with making snares and binds not look like they actually trap anything...its like a ground only flash and thats it.  the old one translated the idea that "you're stuck" a lot better...
what a waste of time for one pointless champion that can get rocked every game.
Unicorns of Love Support Hylissang must disagree.
I really feel like the blackthorn effects aren't as good as they used to be. It doesn't feel like a 1350 RP skin anymore.

100 percent agree. The the q especially has been butchered. It used to have a unique q animation and the hit effect was awesome. Now her q is a recolor. A RECOLOR! On a 1350 RP skin? I have no idea how that made it through
I don't like the ultimate graphic. I thought the chains looked better!
{{champion:25}} Looks so pretty o:
i'd like to see more leaves in the blackthron skin, i like more the actual Effects on the skin, also her W needs a bit more animation, it looks cool but, it's missing something
I saw this and got so excited that her entire kit was being reworked, and was let down so much. ~~Rito please nerf Morgana~~

The updates are nice! But i can't get over the new Blackthorn W particles. It used to be black thorns(tormented soil) that would dissipate in an elegant way. Which is why i bought the skin long ago, now its gone :(
Why are Exiled Morg's abilities not red!
